'''Impregnable Defense''' is a repeatable basic daily [[commission]] in Teyvat.

==Steps==
{{Quest Description|Defeat all enemies and protect the [[Ley Line Monolith]].}}
#Complete the challenge by protecting the [[Ley Line Monolith]] (0/1)
#Enemies defeated (0/x)

==Notes==
*Failing the challenge will cause the monolith to be destroyed, only to be replaced by another monolith with no additional dialogue or achievements.
*Sometimes, extra assets spawn along the monolith to assist with combat, these include: [[Exploding Barrel]]s , [[Hydro Amber]]s, [[Thunder Dwelling]]s, [[Nimbus Gem]]s and [[Thunder Sakura Bough]]s.
*Enemies do not drop loot or experience when killed.

==Rewards==
{{Commission Rewards|full}}
